subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coco Crisp and Stephen Vogt homered, A. J. Griffin struck out seven in seven innings, and the host Oakland Athletics completed a three-game sweep of Tampa Bay with a 5-1 victory on Sunday.
snippet: Coco Crisp and Stephen Vogt homered, A. J. Griffin struck out seven in seven innings, and the host Oakland Athletics completed a three-game sweep of Tampa Bay with a 5-1 victory on Sunday.
